Preface
Perhaps the topic that I am most asked about is how to use deep learning methods for time
series forecasting. Questions range from how to prepare data for deep learning models to what
models to use for speciÔ¨Åc types of forecasting problems. This book was carefully designed to
address these questions and show you exactly how to apply deep learning methods to time series
forecasting problems.
In writing this book, I imagined that you were provided with a dataset and a desire to use
